title: Create Code with Exec
description: In this lab, you will learn how to create code using the exec() function.

meta.title: Create Code with Exec: Unlocking the Power of Python's exec()
meta.description: Learn how to leverage the exec() function in Python to create dynamic code, including custom __init__() methods for classes.
meta.keywords: exec, python, programming tutorial, code generation, class initialization
